Articles.Content:
Build a spaceplane, fly to Eeloo, land on one of the brown spots on Eeloo, deploy a probe or a base and return to Kerbin. You've got 1 launch, so there'll be no refuel. Good luck ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

If you do the challenge and you have a youtube channel, put the link to your YouTube channel in the comments below, make a video of it, upload it on youtube and comment with the link with your video again. If you haven't got a youtube channel, just upload photos and say that it's to this challenge, as I'd love to see some results ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) You've got 4 days maximum for this challenge. Good luck ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Mods, debug menu, cheats, config file edits? Be more specific please.

No mods, nothing else, only stock. No cheats of course, that would be boring, wouldn't it? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) You can refuel twice maximum... You need to launch from the runway like an airplane, land on eeloo, deploy a probe or a base, return to Kerbin and land (on the runway if possible) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> No mods, nothing else, only stock. No cheats of course, that would be boring, wouldn't it? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) You can refuel twice maximum... You need to launch from the runway like an airplane, land on eeloo, deploy a probe or a base, return to Kerbin and land (on the runway if possible) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Alrighty. Thanks.
The one challenge that I know I will fail.
Ya I am pretty sure you would need some sort of warp drive to make it to Eeloo in 2 days, Not even a mamoth with infinite fuel could do that

> 
> You can refuel twice maximum...

Thought you said no refuelling?

Make the rules more specific. Also, you need to do the challenge first. 

> 
> So test your challenge yourself first to make sure it is possible, you don't have to be successful but you'll soon know if the challenge has a hope of being completed.
